title: [vs17.8] Unblock OptProf build
body:
Transfor of work by @mtylerMSFT from https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_git/DotNet-msbuild-Trusted/pullrequest/597532

### Context
Recent changes to OptProf pipeline were not backported to vs17.8 - this is causing that pipeline to not work properly

nodes.body:
Hello! I noticed that you're targeting one of our servicing branches. Please consider updating the version.
<!-- Policy app identification https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=PullRequestIssueManagement. -->

@JanKrivanek an error occurred while backporting to vs17.10, please check the run log for details!
